episodes.title: Jehovah Witnesses KNOCKED MY DOOR!
episodes.description:
Today, the JW's knocked on my door! My son opened the door and when he expressed he wasn't interested, was bombarded with a set of "objection questions" and then closed the door on them. I then decided to take the opportunity to talk to them and ask some questions - this is what transpired.

Please Subscribe.

Check out my other videos including:
The Abuse I suffered as a child: https://youtu.be/IcWf1Xvqyfc
My recovery story: https://youtu.be/l38d5ZaMjI4
My experience when Jehovah Witnesses called on me uninvited in February 2019 : https://youtu.be/8c3RT567sqc
My recent "Return Visit" to the Kingdom Hall: https://youtu.be/LTSxMUmKfsQ
Pressured to find a Cult Husband: https://youtu.be/Vgh5yG6RSvY
My recent study of the Watchtower Magazine: https://youtu.be/rK1I-02RuNo
Jehovah Witnesses Songs Vs Gospel: https://youtu.be/ZniKyF684_Q
LUPUS: https://youtu.be/o3cAuFT-Jwg
